text: The Creation" in 2015 Birgitta Festival () is an Estonian musical theatre festival which every year takes place in Pirita convent, Tallinn. The festival is only in kind in Baltic states. The festival is organised by Tallinn Philharmonics. First festival took place in 2005 and it was initiated by Eri Klas together with Tallinn City Government. Since 2020 festival's artistic director is Dmitry Bertman. Festival's number of visitors is about 8000. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Culture in Tallinn Category:Music festivals in Estonia Category:Classical music in Estonia
title: Birgitta Festival
